msubsection.title: svnAvailable
msubsection.p: Ant condition that verifies that a remote resource is available and identifies a specific type.

attribute.name: target
attribute.doc: File name or URL to the element to be queried during the condition.

attribute.name: type
attribute.doc:
Can be one of the following values:
file : The target must be a file.
dir : The target must be a directory.
